name: Sausage and Shrimp Gumbo
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: This classic Cajun dish with sliced smoked sausage, shrimp, bell peppers and okra in a rich broth is ladled into bowls over rice.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
½ pound large raw shrimp, peeled, deveined
3 cups hot cooked long-grain white rice
directions: Cut sausage into 1/2-inch slices; set aside
Combine flour and oil in a 4 quart heavy saucepan; mixing until smooth
Cook and stir over medium-high heat 3 minutes
Reduce heat to medium; cook and stir 6-8 minutes or until roux is a dark reddish brown
Stir in onion, bell peppers, celery, okra and garlic; cook and stir 8-10 minutes or until vegetables are tender
Stir in chicken broth; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to low; stir in sausage, pepper sauce, black pepper and salt to taste
Bring to a boil; add shrimp and cook 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink
Ladle gumbo into bowls with rice
